abstract: In this lesson students learn about the Magicicada periodical cicadas, a brood of which will emerge in the northeastern U.S. this year after 17 years underground. They can then choose to either participate in a “citizen science” project to track this emergence, or create multimedia cicada exhibits.

byline.original: By JENNIFER CUTRARO and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

headline.main: They're Back ... Learning About Periodical Cicadas to Participate in 'Citizen Science' Projects
